the : 6452
del books new -> of : 1
books new of -> see : 1
new of see -> the : 1
of see the -> day : 1
see the day -> et : 1
see the day -> of : 1
the day et -> the : 1
day et the -> and : 1
et the and -> next : 1
the and next -> first : 1
and next first -> zombie : 1
next first zombie -> king : 1
first zombie king -> the : 1
zombie king the -> the : 1
king the the -> by : 1
the the by -> piers : 1
the by piers -> books : 1
by piers books -> by : 1
piers books by -> ballantine : 1
books by ballantine -> our : 1
by ballantine our -> her : 1
ballantine our her -> girl : 1
our her girl -> to : 1
